uk.org.openseizuredetector.locator

Class SMSReceiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.BroadcastReceiver
      • uk.org.openseizuredetector.locator.SMSReceiver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LocationReceiver

    public class SMSReceiver
extends android.content.BroadcastReceiver
implements LocationReceiver
    Author:
    Graham Jones Class to respond to SMS messages. The action taken depends on the contents of the SMS message. If it contains the correct password, the current location is determined, and an SMS reply sent with details of the current locations. If it contains "geo:", a map viewer (such as OsmAnd) is opened to display the location.
